Posted By: Pontiac (8/27/2011 9:37:44 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
[Bazaar Trader](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Bazaar Trader), [Donate](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Donate), etc... Unlike most things with upkeep, this has no innate sacrifice outlet. Run some [Rust tick](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Rust tick) in your deck to keep it tapped down. Then at each of their upkeeps it is take 3 or discard a card.  
  
Not the greatest of combo's but it might be good for an EDH Zedruu deck.
posts.html:
Bazaar Trader, Donate, etc... Unlike most things with upkeep, this has no innate sacrifice outlet. Run some Rust tick in your deck to keep it tapped down. Then at each of their upkeeps it is take 3 or discard a card.

Not the greatest of combo's but it might be good for an EDH Zedruu deck.
